snippet.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl — Final Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
The new release date for S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl was announced. The game will be released on September 5, 2024 and is available for pre-order now!


Pre-order on PC: https://bit.ly/3Wg6AGC
Pre-order on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/stalker-2-heart-of-chornobyl-ultimate-edition-pre-order/9NJ1V5MDNWP2/0017

Explore our socials:

https://www.stalker2.com/
https://twitter.com/stalker_thegame 
https://www.facebook.com/officialstalker https://www.reddit.com/r/stalker https://discord.gg/stalker 
https://www.instagram.com/stalker2_thegame/

#GoodHuntingStalker #CheckPDA #GSC #stalker2
